page.title: 08LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content:
Since the soil is too poor and the land too steep for the growing of crops,{farming}concentrates upon the production of milk and meat. There are several local farms that supply the area with "green top"{milk.}This milk is untreated and is from tested and approved cows. The milk is very rich and full of goodness. Beef cattle and sheep are raised for meat.
The{textile mills}were the main employers in the past, but the industry has declined considerably. Many mills have been converted into warehouses or house other small industries.
Many of the local people now work in {commerce}and the{professions,}and travel daily to other towns and cities.
